thread.title: Durga Puja 2015 in Hindi: Best Durga Puja SMS, Shayari, WhatsApp Messages to wish Happy Durga Puja greetings!
thread.title_full: Durga Puja 2015 in Hindi: Best Durga Puja SMS, Shayari, WhatsApp Messages to wish Happy Durga Puja greetings!

author: Zainab Mulla
title: Durga Puja 2015 in Hindi: Best Durga Puja SMS, Shayari, WhatsApp Messages to wish Happy Durga Puja greetings!
text:
Durga Puja 2015 in Hindi: Best Durga Puja SMS, Shayari, WhatsApp Messages to wish Happy Durga Puja greetings! By Zainab Mulla on October 18, 2015 at 12:40 PM Comments 
Durga Puja also referred as Durgotsava, Sharadotsav is one of the most prominent festival that is extensively celebrated in India. This festival is celebrated onwards sixth day till tenth day of Navratri. Kolkata one of the best places to visit during Durga Puja as this occasion turns the place into a different city. Durga Puja marks the victory of Goddess Durga over evil demon Mahishasura. (Read: Navratri 2015 Special: The 9 different avatars of Goddess Durga) 
On the last day, devotees immerse the idol in the sacred water body on the evening of Dashami. This ritual symbolizes that Mother Goddess descends to the Earth on Shashti, on the sixth day and returns to her abode on Dashami. One can say that Durga Puja is not just a festival but a big social event where socializing and catch up plans are made. 
On Durga Puja 2015, we have shared a list of messages that you could send to your loved ones. Happy Durga Puja to all out there and hope you enjoy it with gifts, hugs, love, sweets and lots of blessings from Goddess Durga . 
Whatsapp reads: Is Durga Puja aapki zindagi khushion se bhari ho, Duniya ujalo se roshan ho, Ghar par Maa Durga ka aagman ho… Happy Durga Puja… 
Whatsapp reads: Jai Maa Durgaa, Maa aapki har monakamana puri karein. May all your problems solved of your life. Happy Durga Puja. 
Whatsapp reads: Durga Puja Khushiyo ki Ujalo ki Maa Durga ki. Aapki zindagi khushiyose bhari ho Duniya ujalo se roshan ho, Ghar me Maa Durga ka Aagman ho Happy Durga Puja 
Whatsapp reads: Lakshmi ka hath ho Saraswati ka sath hoGanesh ka niwas hoAur maa durga ke aashirwad seAapke jeevan mai prakash hi prakash ho! 
Whatsapp reads: Ambe hai tu jagdambe kali, Jay durge khappar wali! Teri hi gun gawe bharati, Woh maiya hum sab utare teri aarati! Charan saran mein khande tumhari, Le puja ke thali! Bas haat sar par rakh do, Maa sankat harne wali! 
Whatsapp reads: Maa Ki Jyoti Se Noor Milta Hai. Sabke Dilon Ko Surur Milta Hai. Jo Bhi Jata Hai Mata Ke Dwar, Usse Kuch Na Kuch Zaroor Milta Hai. Durga Puja Khushio ka, Ujalo ka, Umeedon Durga ka…. 
Whatsapp reads: Is Durga puja Aapki Zindagi khushiyon se bhari ho, Duniya ujalo se roshan ho, Ghar par Maa Durga ka Aagman ho… Happy Durga Puja! Ashirwad bado ka, pyar dosto ka, duaen sabki, karuna rabki, Durga Puja ki hardik shubhkamnaey.! 
Whatsapp reads: Maa Durge, Maa Ambe, Maa Jagdambe, Maa Bhawani, Maa Sheetla, Maa Vaishno Maa Chandi, Mata Rani meri aur apki manokamna puri karey.. JAI MATA DI. 
Whatsapp reads: Jindagi ki har tamana ho puri, Koi aarju rahe na adhuri, karte hai haanth jodkar maa durga ki winti aapki har manokamna ho puri. happy Durga puja 
Whatsapp reads: Is Durga Puja aapki zindagi khushion se bhari ho, Duniya ujalo se roshan ho, Ghar par Maa Durga ka aagman ho,
